ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Etem is the best guy for learning Turkish, and about the literature, history and culture.
Basically, this is advanced Turkish. If you need Turkish, especially for research, then you should be here. If not, what are you doing?

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I certainly learned more about the language, knowledge of which will help me produce scholarship on Turkish literature and read texts in the original.

I need to be able to read Turkish for my dissertation research and beyond. In particular, I need to be able to read academic Turkish. We read quite a bit of academic Turkish in this class, so I would say it was pretty crucial in preparing me for my research.
